text:
But that doesn’t show the weirdest thing about founders. Usually, we think that opposite traits can’t exist together. For example, a normal person can’t be both rich and poor at the same time. But this happens all the time with founders: startup CEOs might not have cash but are millionaires on paper. They can switch from being grumpy and rude to being really charming.

Most successful entrepreneurs are both part of the group and separate from it. When they do well, they get both fame and bad reputation. If you look at their traits, they seem to follow a strange pattern. 

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Founders often have surprising traits that seem opposite, like being rich on paper but cash poor. They can be charming one moment and rude the next, and their success brings both fame and criticism.
